revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Xterasys |model=XR-1405B |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=12/2002 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=AboCom |manuf_model=WR104K |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=MQ4WR104K |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2 |pwr_barrel_len=10 |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=RDC |cpu1_model=R1620 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=0.5 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV400TTC-90 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=2 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L16161A-7T |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=AboCom WB1530S |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3873B |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3685 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=MMCX |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Kendin |sw_model=KS8995X |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=Untitled |default_ssid_regex=^Untitled$ |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui=00:E0:98 |oui_eth=00:E0:98 |default_ch= }} The FCC ID on the label is invalid. This is the same router as the '''Blitzz''' BWA611 ('''AboCom''' WR104K). "M01-WR14K-A10" and a date code of '''0251''' (Dec. 2002) is silkscreened on the board shown below. [http://www.netstumbler.org/hardware/help-ident-this-card-t9226.html Post on NetStumbler forums regarding the internal card], per this post the card is also used in the D-Link DCS-1000W The internal wireless card registers as a.. *PCMCIA\Wireless-LAN_Adapter-10FC *PCMCIA\Wireless-LAN_Adapter-0156-0002 under a Windows machine and 
Socket 0:
  product info: "Wireless", "LAN Adapter", "Version 01.02", ""
  manfid: 0x0156, 0x0002
  function: 6 (network)
under a Linux machine using '''pccardctl ident'''. The power adapter included with the device is a OEM AD-051A5 (5V, 1.5A). ID/OD/Len measurements are approximate. ==Images== File:Xterasys XR-1405B unit.jpg|unit File:Xterasys XR-1405B label.jpg|label File:Xterasys XR-1405B board top card in.jpg|board top, card in File:Xterasys XR-1405B board top.jpg|board top File:Xterasys XR-1405B board bot.jpg|board bottom [[Has images::internal| ]][[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]]
